parts.text:
The Knight, the player character, stands on a stone platform in a lush, overgrown area of Hallownest, likely Greenpath. The Knight has 6 health masks filled and an almost full Soul meter. The player currently holds 363 Geo. No immediate threats are visible.

**Playable Actions:**
*   Move (Left/Right)
*   Jump
*   Attack (Nail)
*   Focus (Heal/Use Soul)
*   Open Map/Inventory
